availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: George W. Spees (Bracken & Livingston County farmer)

body.p: Bracken County, Kentucky, and Livingston County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married Sarah Spees. Father of Eliza Spees, Mary Spees, and George Spees. Farmer in Bracken County in 1850. Farmer in Livingston County in 1860. Resident of Bracken County, Kentucky, in 1863.

ab.bibl: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Bracken County, Unnamed District, p. 435; Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Livingston County, Division No. 2, p. 73; KYR-0001-004-0012.
